      • generateBoard

        public static void generateBoard(ViewGroup viewGroup,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<EditText> squeres,
                                 Context context,
                                 int startX,
                                 int startY,
                                 int size,
                                 int resource,
                                 int levelKind)
        Generate board for MagicSquare game
        Parameters:
        viewGroup - layout in which board will be generated
        squeres - this list will contain generated squared EditText
        context - activity in which this method is invoked
        startX - x coordinate of left upper board angle
        startY - y coordinate of left upper board angle
        size - size of square
        resource - properties of squared EditText
        levelKind - size of board

      • setSqureValues

        public static void setSqureValues(java.util.ArrayList<EditText> squeres,
                                  int[] startConf)
        Sets text and Focusable property for every square
        Parameters:
        squeres - squares in which this method sets properties
        startConf - gameConfiguration

      • isEndOfGame

        public static boolean isEndOfGame(java.util.ArrayList<EditText> squeres,
                                  int[] solution)
        check is a end of current game
        Parameters:
        squeres - squares of current level
        solution - winning configuration
        Returns:
        true if squares are in winning configuration
